statements: SELECT * FROM MusicEducationInstitution WHERE institution_id = 1;
SELECT institution_name FROM MusicEducationInstitution WHERE transaction_type = 'Payment';
SELECT transaction_amount, payment_method FROM MusicEducationInstitution WHERE transaction_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM MusicEducationInstitution WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT institution_id, institution_name FROM MusicEducationInstitution WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM MusicEducationInstitution WHERE institution_id = 1001 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT institution_name, transaction_amount FROM MusicEducationInstitution WHERE transaction_type = 'Registration' AND transaction_amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC
SELECT institution_name, transaction_date, payment_method FROM MusicEducationInstitution WHERE payment_method IN ('Credit Card', 'PayPal') ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM MusicEducationInstitution WHERE transaction_amount BETWEEN 100.00 AND 500.00 ORDER BY institution_id ASC, transaction_date ASC
SELECT institution_id, institution_name, transaction_type, payment_method FROM MusicEducationInstitution WHERE transaction_type LIKE '%Lesson%' ORDER BY institution_id DESC
SELECT * FROM music_education_institutions;
SELECT institution_name, institution_location FROM music_education_institutions;
SELECT institution_name, institution_location FROM music_education_institutions ORDER BY institution_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT institution_name, institution_location FROM music_education_institutions WHERE institution_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM music_education_institutions WHERE institution_location = 'New York';
SELECT institution_name, institution_location FROM music_education_institutions ORDER BY institution_name ASC, institution_location DESC;
SELECT institution_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_transaction_amount FROM financial_transactions GROUP BY institution_id HAVING AVG(transaction_amount) > 500;

SELECT institution_name, institution_location, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM music_education_institutions INNER JOIN financial_transactions ON music_education_institutions.institution_id = financial_transactions.institution_id WHERE transaction_amount >= 1000 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;

SELECT institution_name, institution_location, COUNT(transaction_id) AS num_transactions FROM music_education_institutions LEFT JOIN financial_transactions ON music_education_institutions.institution_id = financialjson_transactions.institution_id GROUP BY institution_name, institution_location ORDER BY num_transactions DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM music_institutions;
SELECT institution_name, location FROM music_institutions;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;

SELECT institution_name, transaction_date, payment_amount FROM music_institutions JOIN financial_transactions ON music_institutions.institution_id = financial_transactions.institution_id JOIN payments ON financial_transactions.transaction_id = payments.transaction_id;
SELECT institution_id, institution_name, location FROM music_institutions ORDER BY institution_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Purchase' AND amount > 1000;
SELECT institution_name, transaction_date, amount FROM music_institutions JOIN financial_transactions ON music_institutions.institution_id = financial_transactions.institution_id;
SELECT SUM(amount) FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, payment_method, payment_amount FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM institution;
SELECT name, location FROM institution;
SELECT student_id, grade FROM student WHERE grade='A';
SELECT * FROM transaction ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT amount, date FROM payment WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM institution WHERE institution_id = 1;
SELECT name, location FROM institution WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM student WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT student.name, student.instrument, transaction.amount FROM student JOIN transaction ON student.student_id = transaction.student_id;
SELECT payment.date, payment.amount, student.name FROM payment JOIN student ON payment.student_id = student.student_id ORDER BY payment.date DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT description FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount < 500;
SELECT * FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_name, date_of_birth FROM students ORDER BY student_name ASC, date_of_birth DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT payment_id, amount, method FROM payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT course_name, teacher_name FROM courses JOIN teachers ON courses.teacher_id = teachers.teacher_id WHERE courses.teacher_id = 101 ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com' AND student_name NOT LIKE '%Test%' ORDER BY student_name DESC;
